about_the_game:
Story.


George Prinkerton, not expecting anything terrible about the new day, finds himself in a time loop. Shocking events occur one after another, and it would seem that a very simple young man finds himself in a terrifying cycle of events. The hands of the clock inexorably continue their countdown to the next tragedy, without giving our hero a minute's respite. Will you help him get out of this mess, or will you drag him into something more? You have to save a childhood friend from imminent death! And here everything depends on you. Immerse yourself in the fascinating reading of the novel and uncover the secrets of Hateful Days!

Graphics.


Diving into the unique world of black and white shades with bright touches of primary colors, you will be able to notice the carefully thought-out details of the city. Here you will find multi-storey buildings, modest five-storey buildings and unique locations that give this place a unique character. This city is really coming to life before your eyes!

Sprites and CG illustrations.


A lot of sprites and art in the game are not only an important element of style, but also a key means of conveying the events and mood of the game. They play a special role in the narrative, helping to emphasize the personality and character of the characters. Although most of the sprites in the game are made in black and white, sometimes there are other shades that add variety and highlight the features of each character.

Factions.


You will meet with various factions in the city, and it's up to you to decide which side you will be on. Think twice, because your choice could be your worst nightmare!

Characters.

Vanessa Lemington.


The best friend of the main character of our story has a beautiful appearance, a sweet voice and charming character traits. She loves watching anime, trying foreign dishes and admires the famous idol from Bathory Izumi Itatsu. Now it's up to you to save her from a series of sudden tragic deaths. Be determined and don't let her die in vain!

George Prinkerton.


George is a college student aspiring to become a detective, following the example of his parents, the owners of the Prinkerton Detective Agency. His intelligence and quick wit leave no doubt about his abilities, and his composure and determination make him unshakable in any situation. Nothing can break him! Isn't it?

Features of the game:

•Great music.
•Vocal compositions.
•50+ backgrounds
•50+ story illustrations.
•An interesting non-linear plot with multiple endings.
•Atmospheric conditions.
